user_data.target_needs: I wanted to fulfill the need for practical, stylish clothing that requires minimal care and can be worn in different situations.
purchase_reason: I was looking for a versatile and easy-care clothing option that could maintain a classic style throughout the week. The wrinkle-resistant feature was particularly appealing as it promised convenience and a polished look without much effort. However, my overall impression was that it met my needs but didn't exceed my expectations.

Similar to my previous purchase, I sought a practical and stylish pant that could be worn in various settings. The flat-front design and wrinkle-resistant quality were key factors in my decision, as I wanted something that would look good with minimal maintenance. Again, while it served its purpose, it didn't stand out significantly.
user_data.general_preference: I generally prefer products that offer comfort, durability, and practical features. I appreciate items that are designed for everyday wear and can withstand various conditions, such as moisture-wicking fabrics and stain resistance. I value quality materials that provide a good fit and feel, as well as features that enhance usability, like reinforced areas for added protection. However, I tend to dislike products that do not meet my expectations in terms of quality or comfort, especially if they feel subpar or do not provide good value for money. Overall, I look for reliable and comfortable apparel that can be used in both casual and work settings.
